commit.message: libsyntax: Don't ICE on macro invocation in count expr of fixed array type.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@

+// except according to those terms.
+
+#![feature(macro_rules)]
+
+macro_rules! four (
+    () => (4)
+)
+fn main() {
+    let _x: [u16, ..four!()];
+}
